Question: This person grew irritated at Columbia's delay releasing Aura.
Hints: This person persuaded Coltrane to play with the group on one final European tour in the spring of 1960.
Miles Dewey **** was born on May 26, 1926, to an affluent African American family in Alton, Illinois.
As **** stated in his autobiography, he wanted to make music for the young African-American audience.
